# Welcome!

I'm an applied mathematician and data scientist with a Ph.D. in Applied Mathematics from University of California Merced. I'm excited about using mathematics and statistics to solve problems. I'm also passionate about teaching mathematics and statistics because I think that everyone should have the opportunity to learn these essential skills for solving problems.
